attributes.action: increase the inheritence tax level to £550,000 or higher
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I do not believe that this form of taxation can necessarily be replaced without the introduction of some other tax or increase in direct personal taxation as a replacement which of course would also be unacceptable. The Daily Express campaign is misleading and an ill advised route.

Surely the level at which estates are subject to inheritance tax should be increased to a higher level than that proposed by the Chancellor -perhaps to a more acceptable sum of £550,000 or even higher.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions on this issue already. 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=inheritance+tax
While this petition may not be identical to any other we are trying to reduce the quantity on any particular issue so not to dillute signatures across multiple petitions and make finding petitions easier for users. Please consider signing an existing petition.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
